Title: Increases penalties for the crimes of criminal diversion of prescription medications and prescriptions and criminal sale of a prescription
Summary: Increases penalties for the crimes of criminal diversion of prescription medications and prescriptions in the first, second, third and fourth degrees and criminal sale of a prescription.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing penalties for the crimes of criminal diversion of prescription medications and prescriptions in the first, second, third and fourth degrees and criminal sale of a prescription
